thread.section_title: EatNow Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of EatNow | eatnow.com.au
thread.title: Lee Bugeja

author: Lee Bugeja
title: Lee Bugeja
text:
Eat now got my order wrong so phoned them after phoning pizza shop which would not help accept to say phone Eat Now .After being on the phone for two and half hours a person name Marie came on and then said that she could not hear me and hung up.
Well me and my family were looking forward to having pizza for tea which did not happen.The out come three and half hours later (10.40pm) They made my order and there was no compensation. I will never use EAT NOW again and do not recommend anyone else to use them
